snippet: An unlikely error from goalkeeper Gianluigi Buffon gave 10-man Lecce a late equalizer as host Juventus was held to a 1-1 draw that cut its lead over A.C. Milan to 1 point with two Italian Serie A rounds remaining.
lead_paragraph: An unlikely error from goalkeeper Gianluigi Buffon gave 10-man Lecce a late equalizer as host Juventus was held to a 1-1 draw that cut its lead over A.C. Milan to 1 point with two Italian Serie A rounds remaining.

headline.main: Juventus Lead Over A.C. Milan Narrows
